section.para: To view a list of Capacity Units of Measure by Product Category, select the "Capacity UOMs by Product Category" option. The following screen will appear:
When displaying Capacity UOMs by Product Category, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to display Capacity UOMs for all Product Categories.
Specify Product Category whose Capacity UOMs you want to display.
Enter a Product Category pattern to select a range of Product Categories.
Refine your search using Regular Expressions, as described in FINDME "Topic: Pattern Matching with Regular Expressions".
Display lists Capacity UOMs by Product Category, using the specified parameters.
The list shows Capacity UOMs for all the Items in the Product Categories specified above.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.
